title: CancellationEvent
description: The adjusted dates for a specific cancellation date, including the adjusted exercise date and adjusted termination date.

adjustedExerciseDate.description: The date on which option exercise takes place. This date should already be adjusted for any applicable business day convention.

adjustedEarlyTerminationDate.description: The early termination date that is applicable if an early termination provision is exercised. This date should already be adjusted for any applicable business day convention.
